dn22:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kurusu viharati kammasadhammam nama kurunam nigamo.
dn22:1.7: “Ekayano ayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya, sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam cattaro satipatthana.
dn22:1.9: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam,
dn22:1.10: vedanasu vedananupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam,
dn22:1.11: citte cittanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam,
dn22:1.12: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn22:2.1: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati?
dn22:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
dn22:2.4: Digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati.
dn22:2.5: Rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati.
dn22:2.7: ‘Passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
dn22:2.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dakkho bhamakaro va bhamakarantevasi va digham va anchanto ‘digham anchami’ti pajanati, rassam va anchanto ‘rassam anchami’ti pajanati;
dn22:2.9: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati, rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati.
dn22:2.10: ‘Sabbakayapatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘sabbakayapatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
dn22:2.11: Iti ajjhattam va kaye kayanupassi viharati, bahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharati.
dn22:2.12: Samudayadhammanupassi va kayasmim viharati, vayadhammanupassi va kayasmim viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi va kayasmim viharati.
dn22:2.13: ‘Atthi kayo’ti va panassa sati paccupatthita hoti yavadeva nanamattaya patissatimattaya anissito ca viharati, na ca kinci loke upadiyati.
dn22:2.14: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati.
dn22:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto va ‘gacchami’ti pajanati, thito va ‘thitomhi’ti pajanati, nisinno va ‘nisinnomhi’ti pajanati, sayano va ‘sayanomhi’ti pajanati,
dn22:3.2: yatha yatha va panassa kayo panihito hoti tatha tatha nam pajanati.
dn22:3.3: Iti ajjhattam va kaye kayanupassi viharati, bahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharati.

dn22:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kayam uddham padatala adho kesamatthaka tacapariyantam puram nanappakarassa asucino paccavekkhati:
dn22:5.2: ‘atthi imasmim kaye kesa loma nakha danta taco, mamsam nharu atthi atthiminjam vakkam, hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam papphasam, antam antagunam udariyam karisam, pittam semham pubbo lohitam sedo medo, assu vasa khelo singhanika lasika muttan’ti.
dn22:5.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ubhatomukha putoli pura nanavihitassa dhannassa, seyyathidam—salinam vihinam mugganam masanam tilanam tandulanam. Tamenam cakkhuma puriso muncitva paccavekkheyya: ‘ime sali, ime vihi ime mugga ime masa ime tila ime tandula’ti.
dn22:5.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kayam uddham padatala adho kesamatthaka tacapariyantam puram nanappakarassa asucino paccavekkhati:
dn22:5.7: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati.

dn22:6.2: ‘atthi imasmim kaye pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu’ti.
dn22:6.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dakkho goghatako va goghatakantevasi va gavim vadhitva catumahapathe bilaso vibhajitva nisinno assa;
dn22:6.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kayam yathathitam yathapanihitam dhatuso paccavekkhati:
dn22:6.5: ‘atthi imasmim kaye pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu’ti.

dn22:7.5: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati.

dn22:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukham va vedanam vedayamano ‘sukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.3: Dukkham va vedanam vedayamano ‘dukkham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.4: Adukkhamasukham va vedanam vedayamano ‘adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.5: Samisam va sukham vedanam vedayamano ‘samisam sukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.6: Niramisam va sukham vedanam vedayamano ‘niramisam sukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.7: Samisam va dukkham vedanam vedayamano ‘samisam dukkham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.8: Niramisam va dukkham vedanam vedayamano ‘niramisam dukkham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.9: Samisam va adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayamano ‘samisam adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.10: Niramisam va adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayamano ‘niramisam adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
dn22:11.11: Iti ajjhattam va vedanasu vedananupassi viharati, bahiddha va vedanasu vedananupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va vedanasu vedananupassi viharati.

dn22:12.1: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte cittanupassi viharati?
dn22:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saragam va cittam ‘saragam cittan’ti pajanati.
dn22:12.18: Iti ajjhattam va citte cittanupassi viharati, bahiddha va citte cittanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va citte cittanupassi viharati.
dn22:12.19: Samudayadhammanupassi va cittasmim viharati, vayadhammanupassi va cittasmim viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi va cittasmim viharati.

dn22:13.1: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati?
dn22:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati pancasu nivaranesu.
dn22:13.3: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati pancasu nivaranesu?
dn22:13.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santam va ajjhattam kamacchandam ‘atthi me ajjhattam kamacchando’ti pajanati, asantam va ajjhattam kamacchandam ‘natthi me ajjhattam kamacchando’ti pajanati, yatha ca anuppannassa kamacchandassa uppado hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca uppannassa kamacchandassa pahanam hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca pahinassa kamacchandassa ayatim anuppado hoti tanca pajanati.
dn22:13.5: Santam va ajjhattam byapadam ‘atthi me ajjhattam byapado’ti pajanati, asantam va ajjhattam byapadam ‘natthi me ajjhattam byapado’ti pajanati, yatha ca anuppannassa byapadassa uppado hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca uppannassa byapadassa pahanam hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca pahinassa byapadassa ayatim anuppado hoti tanca pajanati.
dn22:13.6: Santam va ajjhattam thinamiddham ‘atthi me ajjhattam thinamiddhan’ti pajanati, asantam va ajjhattam thinamiddham ‘natthi me ajjhattam thinamiddhan’ti pajanati, yatha ca anuppannassa thinamiddhassa uppado hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca uppannassa thinamiddhassa pahanam hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca pahinassa thinamiddhassa ayatim anuppado hoti tanca pajanati.

dn22:13.8: Santam va ajjhattam vicikiccham ‘atthi me ajjhattam vicikiccha’ti pajanati, asantam va ajjhattam vicikiccham ‘natthi me ajjhattam vicikiccha’ti pajanati, yatha ca anuppannaya vicikicchaya uppado hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca uppannaya vicikicchaya pahanam hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca pahinaya vicikicchaya ayatim anuppado hoti tanca pajanati.

dn22:14.2: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati pancasu upadanakkhandhesu?
dn22:14.4: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
dn22:14.5: iti vedana, iti vedanaya samudayo, iti vedanaya atthangamo;
dn22:14.6: iti sanna, iti sannaya samudayo, iti sannaya atthangamo;
dn22:14.7: iti sankhara, iti sankharanam samudayo, iti sankharanam atthangamo,
dn22:14.8: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti,
dn22:14.9: iti ajjhattam va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati.

dn22:15.2: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati chasu ajjhattikabahiresu ayatanesu?

dn22:17.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu.
dn22:17.2: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu?
dn22:17.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
dn22:18.2: Jatipi dukkha, jarapi dukkha, maranampi dukkham, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasapi dukkha, appiyehi sampayogopi dukkho, piyehi vippayogopi dukkho, yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham, sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
dn22:18.4: Ya tesam tesam sattanam tamhi tamhi sattanikaye jati sanjati okkanti abhinibbatti khandhanam patubhavo ayatananam patilabho,
dn22:18.7: Ya tesam tesam sattanam tamhi tamhi sattanikaye jara jiranata khandiccam paliccam valittacata ayuno samhani indriyanam paripako,
dn22:18.10: Yam tesam tesam sattanam tamha tamha sattanikaya cuti cavanata bhedo antaradhanam maccu maranam kalakiriya khandhanam bhedo kalevarassa nikkhepo jivitindriyassupacchedo,
dn22:18.13: Yo kho, bhikkhave, annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa soko socana socitattam antosoko antoparisoko,
dn22:18.16: Yo kho, bhikkhave, annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa adevo paridevo adevana paridevana adevitattam paridevitattam,
dn22:18.19: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam dukkham kayikam asatam kayasamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam,
dn22:18.22: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cetasikam dukkham cetasikam asatam manosamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam,
dn22:18.25: Yo kho, bhikkhave, annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa ayaso upayaso ayasitattam upayasitattam,
dn22:18.27: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho?
dn22:18.28: Idha yassa te honti anittha akanta amanapa rupa sadda gandha rasa photthabba dhamma, ye va panassa te honti anatthakama ahitakama aphasukakama ayogakkhemakama, ya tehi saddhim sangati samagamo samodhanam missibhavo,
dn22:18.29: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho.
dn22:18.30: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo dukkho?
dn22:18.31: Idha yassa te honti ittha kanta manapa rupa sadda gandha rasa photthabba dhamma, ye va panassa te honti atthakama hitakama phasukakama yogakkhemakama mata va pita va bhata va bhagini va mitta va amacca va natisalohita va, ya tehi saddhim asangati asamagamo asamodhanam amissibhavo,
dn22:18.32: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo dukkho.
dn22:18.33: Katamanca, bhikkhave, yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham?
dn22:18.34: Jatidhammanam, bhikkhave, sattanam evam iccha uppajjati:
dn22:18.35: ‘aho vata mayam na jatidhamma assama, na ca vata no jati agaccheyya’ti.
dn22:18.37: idampi yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham.
dn22:18.38: Jaradhammanam, bhikkhave, sattanam evam iccha uppajjati:
dn22:18.39: ‘aho vata mayam na jaradhamma assama, na ca vata no jara agaccheyya’ti.
dn22:18.40: Na kho panetam icchaya pattabbam, idampi yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham.
dn22:18.41: Byadhidhammanam, bhikkhave, sattanam evam iccha uppajjati ‘aho vata mayam na byadhidhamma assama, na ca vata no byadhi agaccheyya’ti.
dn22:18.42: Na kho panetam icchaya pattabbam, idampi yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham.
dn22:18.43: Maranadhammanam, bhikkhave, sattanam evam iccha uppajjati ‘aho vata mayam na maranadhamma assama, na ca vata no maranam agaccheyya’ti.
dn22:18.44: Na kho panetam icchaya pattabbam, idampi yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham.
dn22:18.45: Sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhammanam, bhikkhave, sattanam evam iccha uppajjati ‘aho vata mayam na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhamma assama, na ca vata no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasaa agaccheyyun’ti.
dn22:18.47: idampi yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham.
dn22:18.48: Katame ca, bhikkhave, sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha?
dn22:18.50: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
dn22:19.2: Yayam tanha ponobbhavika nandiragasahagata tatratatrabhinandini, seyyathidam—
dn22:19.4: Sa kho panesa, bhikkhave, tanha kattha uppajjamana uppajjati, kattha nivisamana nivisati?

dn22:20.2: Yo tassayeva tanhaya asesaviraganirodho cago patinissaggo mutti analayo.
dn22:20.3: Sa kho panesa, bhikkhave, tanha kattha pahiyamana pahiyati, kattha nirujjhamana nirujjhati?
dn22:20.4: Yam loke piyarupam satarupam, etthesa tanha pahiyamana pahiyati, ettha nirujjhamana nirujjhati.
dn22:20.6: Cakkhu loke piyarupam satarupam, etthesa tanha pahiyamana pahiyati, ettha nirujjhamana nirujjhati.

dn22:21.3: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
dn22:21.5: Yam kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe nanam, dukkhasamudaye nanam, dukkhanirodhe nanam, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam.
dn22:21.11: Musavada veramani pisunaya vacaya veramani pharusaya vacaya veramani samphappalapa veramani.
dn22:21.14: Panatipata veramani adinnadana veramani kamesumicchacara veramani.
dn22:21.17: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako micchaajivam pahaya sammaajivena jivitam kappeti.
dn22:21.20: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
dn22:21.21: uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
dn22:21.22: anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
dn22:21.23: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
dn22:21.26: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
dn22:21.27: vedanasu vedananupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
dn22:21.28: citte cittanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
dn22:21.29: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn22:21.32: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn22:21.33: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn22:21.34: Pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn22:21.35: Sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn22:21.37: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
dn22:21.38: Iti ajjhattam va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati.
dn22:21.39: Samudayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, vayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati.
dn22:21.40: ‘Atthi dhamma’ti va panassa sati paccupatthita hoti yavadeva nanamattaya patissatimattaya anissito ca viharati, na ca kinci loke upadiyati.
dn22:21.41: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu.
dn22:22.1: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya sattavassani, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
dn22:22.2: dittheva dhamme anna; sati va upadisese anagamita.
dn22:22.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya cha vassani …pe…
dn22:22.11: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya sattamasani, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
dn22:22.12: dittheva dhamme anna; sati va upadisese anagamita.
dn22:22.14: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya cha masani …pe…
dn22:22.22: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya sattaham, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
dn22:22.23: dittheva dhamme anna; sati va upadisese anagamitati.
dn22:22.24: Ekayano ayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya yadidam cattaro satipatthanati.
dn22:22.25: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
dn22:22.27: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
